<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Fading Fox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1159)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

With fur that shifts between hues of red, dull brown, and silver as it moves, the fading fox vexes any pursuer. It has a knack for escaping traps, leaves no footprints, and seemingly disappears into thin air. Fading foxes have lustrous fur and a robust build that set them apart from their red fox progenitors.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Fox_FadingFox.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Fading Fox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1159)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 102</row>

**Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 25

**Fade Away** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within 30 feet that the fading fox is aware of either moves toward the fox or targets it with an ability; **Requirements** The fading fox is in natural surroundings; **Effect** The fading fox [Hides](/Actions.aspx?ID=62). If its [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check result meets or exceeds the triggering creature's Perception DC, the fading fox is [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to that creature. The fading fox can use this reaction even if it is being [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Leaping Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The fading fox either Strides or [Leaps](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) up to its Speed and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the fox began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The fading fox deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Trackless Step**   The fading fox always gains the benefits of [Cover Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65) in natural surroundings, even while moving at full Speed.

**Vanish into the Wilds** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** The fading fox is in natural surroundings; **Effect** The fading fox Steps, then [Hides](/Actions.aspx?ID=62), then [Sneaks](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). It can take this Step into natural difficult terrain and can Hide in this way even if it is being [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-236" />
name: Fading Fox
